# currentOrder

**Type Property**

Gets the customized order of the promotion info objects the represent promoted products.

## Declaration

```swift
static var currentOrder: [Product.PromotionInfo] { get async throws }
```

## Discussion

This asynchronous array returns a list of [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Product/PromotionInfo] objects in the custom order they appear in on the device.



For information about setting the default order using App Store Connect, see [https://developer.apple.com/help/app-store-connect/configure-in-app-purchase-settings/promote-in-app-purchases].
title: currentOrder
